answers.answer: Hello Antoinetter,The burning sensation in your feet could be due to neuropathy,diabetes,spinal stenosis,nerve entrapment and many other reasons.You need to consult a neurophysician and go in for nerve conduction studies and MRI to rule out any pathology.You should take vitamin B 12 supplementation to prevent the demyleination of nerves.Also folic acid injections may be effective.You should go in for a complete evaluation.Best

question: I have a burning feeling in my leg which lasts for at least 3 days per month.. I am 35 years and having this problem for about 10 yrs now.  all blood test comes back negative.  It feels as if someone pour hot water on my leg..Can you say whay is the problem and wha can i do
title: Burning feeling in leg
